/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image captures a typical day on a street in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of nature and architecture.
